divs: Sighting DetailsStanding on my porch like I do every night checking the sky while I smoke. Say a bright red light traveling along but was not blinking at all from nw to ne . I hollered to my daughter to get out here so she could see it.It was getting closer and I just about got a good view nnnn it disappeared. Frustrated and freezing I waited as long as I could but never reappeared for me. Trust me I was checking out the skylights and poking my head out the front door for the rest of the afternoon. Still no luck.
Summary: Steady Bright red wight light moving from nw/ne then vanish
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Emmett
There were no other sightings in Emmett on or around December 30th 2012
